name: JumpSport
description: JumpSport is a leading manufacturer of recreational and fitness trampolines, renowned for pioneering safety innovations like the trampoline safety net enclosure. Their products cater to all ages, offering low-impact cardiovascular exercise and promoting overall health and wellness.

products.name: JumpSport 350 PRO Fitness Trampoline
products.description: A 39-inch fitness trampoline featuring adjustable medium or firm bounce settings, with a weight rating of up to 300 lbs. Available in various limited edition colors.

products.name: JumpSport 550 PRO CE+ Fitness Trampoline
products.description: Designed for both home and fitness club use, this trampoline offers robust durability, stackable bumpers for easy storage, an enhanced skirt mat, and adjustable cords for a customizable, safe bounce.

products.name: JumpSport Home 120 Fitness Trampoline
products.description: An entry-level 44-inch trampoline with 36 elastic resistance bands and a built-in handlebar for extra stability, supporting users up to 250 lbs.

customer_reviews.name: Sarah M.
customer_reviews.comment: The JumpSport trampoline has been a fantastic addition to my home workouts; it's fun and effective.

customer_reviews.name: David L.
customer_reviews.comment: I appreciate the sturdy design and the low-impact exercise it provides. Great for my joints.

customer_reviews.name: Linda K.
customer_reviews.comment: The adjustable bounce feature is excellent, and the quality is top-notch. Highly recommend!

promotions.title: New Year, New You - 15% Off
promotions.details: From January 1st to January 31st, enjoy 15% off all trampolines and accessories.

contact_information.address: JumpSport, Inc., 2055 S. 7th Street, San Jose, CA 95112

additional_info.unique_feature: Invented the trampoline safety net enclosure, enhancing safety for users worldwide.
